detail.content: Showing II/III: Nov 13th - Nov 15th: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Dance Chair's Message / Social Undergraduate Graduate Course Offerings Performances News & Events Dance & New Media Live Second Avenue Dance Company Summer High School Alumni Current Students Admin & Faculty  home > Dance        Showing II/III: Nov 13th - Nov 15th  Showing II/III November 13th-15th, 8pm 111 2nd Avenue Fifth Floor Theater    Each year Tisch Dance presents five Showings. These Showings are opportunities for students - from both the Bachelor's and Master's degree programs - to perform and choreograph. Supervised by our experienced faculty, these showings are comprised entirely of student choreographers and serve as a means through which students experiment with different aesthetics, styles, and concepts of dance. Lasting around an hour and a half, the Showings are performed with full lights, costumes, and music in the fifth floor theater at 111 2nd Avenue, and are a wonderful display of the individuality, ingenuity, and intelligence of the dancers and choreographers at Tisch.      Choreographers: Mirela Amaral, Rohan Bhargava, Willa Brown, Angie Conte, Lukas Dellios, David Gourov, Mathew James, Stephanie Kies, Kyle Mullins, Carley Santori, Lauren Settembrino, Bridget Struthers, Hyung Ji Yu, Xiang Xu, Yachao Zhu.  RESERVE TICKETS NOW!
